sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import styles from '../../ProfileBlocks.module.css'; const RequestsContent = ({ currentRequest, handleAccept, handleDecline }) => (
{currentRequest.is_accepted_request === null ? (
Заявка на курирование ВКР
) : ( currentRequest.is_accepted_request === true && currentRequest.is_accepted_theme === false ? (
Заявка на смену темы ВКР
) : null )} {currentRequest.student.surname} {currentRequest.student.name} {currentRequest.student.patronymic} {currentRequest.student.group} {currentRequest.student.average_score} Тема ВКР: {currentRequest.theme_str} Тип ВКР: {currentRequest.type_of_fqw} Дополнительно: {currentRequest.additional_information} Утвердить тему ВКР
); export default RequestsContent;
